item.title: 特朗普关税计划的目标是什么？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在竞选期间曾承诺将进口税重新置于美国经济政策的中心位置，此后他迅速朝着这个方向迈进，宣布了多项针对美国贸易伙伴的新关税计划。【原文：After promising during his election campaign to put import taxes back at the center of US economic policy, President Donald Trump has moved swiftly in that direction, announcing multiple plans for significant new tariffs aimed at US trading partners.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行在美国关税压力下寻求宽松政策
item.description: 尽管美国提议对墨西哥所有出口商品征收关税带来了不确定性，但墨西哥央行决策者仍承诺继续放宽货币政策。【原文：Mexican central bank policymakers pledged to continue monetary policy easing despite the uncertainty generated by the US proposal to implement tariffs on all of Mexico’s exports.】

item.title: 特朗普加沙计划引发地区震荡，埃及暂缓加息
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易关税和有争议的将巴勒斯坦人迁出加沙的提议引发了新的经济不确定性，埃及选择谨慎行事，将利率维持在历史最高水平。【原文：Egypt kept interest rates at a record high, opting for caution as US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs and controversial proposal to relocate Palestinians from Gaza stoke fresh economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 可可利润率上升减少了对象牙海岸收成的需求
item.description: 象牙海岸下一季可可作物的销售起步缓慢，因为出口商们正从暴涨的行情中挣扎出来，这使得对冲采购的风险更大。【原文：Sales of next season’s cocoa crop in top producer Ivory Coast are off to a slow start, as exporters reel from a blistering rally that has made it riskier to hedge purchases.】

item.title: 收益超预期，宏利股价创一年来最大涨幅
item.description: 宏利金融公司（Manulife Financial Corp. ）第四季度业绩超出预期，为一年来的强劲增长画上了句号，该公司股价创下一年来最大盘中涨幅。【原文：Shares of Manulife Financial Corp. made their largest intraday gain in a year after the company beat expectations in the fourth quarter, capping off a year of strong growth.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆认为通胀率停滞在 2% 以上的风险增加
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，在通胀率明确达到央行2%的目标之前，政策应保持 "适度的限制性"，他认为进展可能停滞甚至逆转的风险增加。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said policy should remain “modestly restrictive” until it’s clear inflation is on track to the central bank’s 2% target, and that he sees increased risks that progress may stall or even reverse.】

item.title: 加拿大将卡特尔列为恐怖分子，试图阻止特朗普征收关税
item.description: 在特朗普政府利用关税威胁推动加强对跨境非法毒品贸易的遏制之后，加拿大正在扩大其打击贩毒集团的权力。【原文：Canada is broadening its power to clamp down on cartels after the Trump administration used tariff threats to push for stronger curbs of the cross-border illegal drug trade.】

item.title: 卡骆驰鞋能告诉我们很多关于特朗普关税经济的信息
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 帕特里克-马霍梅斯的母校与穆尼斯合作改造体育场
item.description: 德克萨斯理工大学的足球场是堪萨斯城酋长队四分卫帕特里克-马霍梅斯（Patrick Mahomes）效力过的地方，也是最新一个由债务融资改造的球场。【原文：The football stadium at Texas Tech University, where Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes played, is the latest to get a debt-financed face-lift.】

item.title: 南方公司首席执行官称，特朗普将允许天然气管道进一步扩建
item.description: 美国东南部公用事业公司的负责人表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统放宽许可要求、加快能源资源开发的举措，将使南方公司（Southern Co.【原文：President Donald Trump’s drive to loosen permitting requirements and speed up the development of energy resources will allow for Southern Co. to expand its natural gas pipeline network and build new gas plants, the head of the US Southeast utility said.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯选择迈阿密设立第二个美国投资办事处
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将在迈阿密开设一个投资办事处，此前沙特王国的实际统治者曾承诺促进美国投资。【原文：Saudi Arabia will open an investment office in Miami, after the kingdom’s de-facto ruler pledged to boost US investment.】

item.title: 收益稳定币替代品获美国证券交易委员会批准
item.description: 长期以来，许多加密货币市场参与者都希望获得有收益的稳定币，他们每天使用代币促成数十亿美元的交易。【原文：Yield-bearing stablecoins have long been on the wish list of many crypto market participants who use the tokens to facilitate billions of dollars in transactions daily.】

item.title: 马斯克 X 扭亏为盈的背后：精挑细选的财务数据
item.description: 尽管埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 控股公司（X Holdings Corp. ）的估值焕然一新，但这家社交媒体平台仍深陷债务泥潭，其命运的改善主要归功于大幅调整的财务数据和投资者对错失良机的恐惧。【原文：Even as Elon Musk’s X Holdings Corp. basks in a valuation facelift, the social-media platform remains mired in debt and its improved fortunes owe much to heavily adjusted financials and investors’ fear of missing out.】

item.title: 莫桑比克经济因投票骚乱出现七年来最大降幅
item.description: 在大选后的抗议活动导致商业活动停滞之后，莫桑比克第四季度的经济萎缩幅度达到了至少七年来的最大值。【原文：Mozambique’s economy contracted the most in at least seven years in the fourth quarter, after post-election protests shuttered business activity.】

item.title: 摩根大通将卡塔尔和科威特重新归类为发达市场
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）将卡塔尔和科威特重新归类为发达市场，并将很快开始分阶段将其从新兴市场债券指数中剔除。摩根大通还表示，阿联酋可能会在明年被剔除。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. reclassified Qatar and Kuwait as developed markets and will soon start their removal from its Emerging-Markets Bond Index in a phased manner. It also said the United Arab Emirates may be taken out of the cluster next year.】

item.title: 冰岛总理希望摆脱对旅游业的依赖
item.description: 冰岛总理表示，冰岛计划对旅游业征收资源费，这将有助于控制旅游业，保护冰岛的自然环境，同时政府将重点转向创造更高价值的产业。【原文：Icelandic plans for a resource fee on tourism will help bring the industry under control and safeguard the country’s nature while the government is shifting its focus to industries creating higher value, according to the nation’s prime minister.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克认为 2025 年将有两次减息，但前景并不明朗
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他预计美国央行将在2025年降息两次，不过这一预测的不确定性已经上升。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he expects the US central bank will lower interest rates twice in 2025, though uncertainty around that projection has risen.】

item.title: ETF收购步伐加快，富达引领模型投资组合热潮
item.description: 随着对现成和定制的跨资产类别投资策略的需求持续上升，富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）成为最新一家加强模型投资组合业务的资产管理公司。【原文：Fidelity Investments is the latest asset manager to ramp up its model-portfolio business as demand for off-the-shelf and customized investment strategies across asset classes continues to pick up.】

item.title: Janus Henderson 分析师被控经营 WFH 内幕交易团伙
item.description: 杰纳斯-亨德森集团（Janus Henderson Group Plc）的一名分析师被英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）指控，在科维德公司（Covid-19）封锁期间，他在伦敦的家中进行内幕交易。【原文：A Janus Henderson Group Plc analyst was accused by the Financial Conduct Authority of running an insider trading ring from his London home during Covid-19 lockdowns.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会以规模较小的 "网络 "部门取代加密货币执法团队
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会正在更换专门处理加密货币市场不当行为的执法部门，这是监管机构对数字资产采取更加友好态度的最新迹象。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is replacing its enforcement unit devoted to misconduct in the cryptocurrency markets, the latest sign of the regulator’s more friendly approach to digital assets.】

item.title: 亚马逊米高梅电影公司获得詹姆斯-邦德电影的创意控制权
item.description: 亚马逊米高梅电影公司与长期监护人迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）和芭芭拉-布洛柯里（Barbara Broccoli）成立了一家新的合资公司，从而获得了詹姆斯-邦德电影系列的创意控制权。【原文：Amazon MGM Studios has gained creative control of the James Bond film franchise by establishing a new joint venture with longtime custodians Michael Wilson and Barbara Broccoli.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯推出货币符号以提升金融地位
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯为其本币推出了一个新的符号，作为将王国建设成为全球金融中心的努力的一部分。【原文：Saudi Arabia has introduced a new symbol for its local currency as part of efforts to establish the kingdom as a global financial hub.】

item.title: 访问特朗普世界，米莱寻求从加密货币事件中反弹
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）自2023年上台以来，第一次在政治上处于守势，因为他的政府陷入了大规模的加密货币丑闻。华盛顿之行让他有机会重新站稳脚跟。【原文：For the first time since he stormed to power in 2023, Argentina’s Javier Milei is on the political defensive after plunging his government into a massive cryptocurrency scandal. A trip to Washington gives him a chance to get back on his front foot.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织开始访问莫桑比克并表示将继续提供支持
item.description: 代表团团长巴勃罗-洛佩斯-墨菲说，国际货币基金组织正在访问莫桑比克，并承诺将继续提供支持。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is visiting Mozambique and has pledged its continued support, Mission Chief Pablo Lopez Murphy said.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易首脑表示愿与美国合作降低关税
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人表示，欧盟愿意与特朗普政府合作达成一项协议，降低工业产品的关税，增加对天然气和大豆等美国出口商品的采购。【原文：The European Union is willing to work with the Trump administration on a deal that would lower tariffs for industrial goods and boost purchases of American exports like natural gas and soybeans, the bloc’s trade chief said.】

item.title: 亿万富翁阿加瓦尔为印度核电站寻找合作伙伴
item.description: 亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）控制的韦丹塔集团（Vedanta Group）正在寻求全球企业竞标在印度建设五千兆瓦的核能发电能力。【原文：Billionaire Anil Agarwal-controlled Vedanta Group is seeking bids from global firms for building five gigawatts of nuclear power capacity in India, which the mining conglomerate plans to use for meeting energy needs at its facilities.】

item.title: 欧洲央行希望建立基于区块链的支付系统
item.description: 欧洲中央银行希望建立一个基于区块链的支付系统，允许金融机构以央行货币结算交易，这可能是向推出批发性央行数字货币（或称 CBDC）迈出的一步。【原文：The European Central Bank wants to establish a blockchain-based payment system that allows financial institutions to settle transactions in central-bank money, a potential step toward introducing a wholesale central bank digital currency, or CBDC.】

item.title: 明星 GMO 债券投资者从危机后新兴市场游戏规则中跳出来
item.description: 蒂娜-范德思特尔（Tina Vandersteel）在过去一年中赚取了丰厚的回报，现在她正逐步放弃一些世界上风险最大的投资项目。【原文：After minting outsize returns in the past year, Tina Vandersteel is pivoting away from some of the world’s riskiest credits.】

item.title: 保罗-艾伦的家族办公室分拆促进微软股票销售
item.description: 2021 年底，Cercano 管理公司从微软公司联合创始人保罗-艾伦（Paul Allen）的家族办公室分拆出来，此后一年，其美股投资组合中美国软件巨头的权重达到 17%。【原文：The year after Cercano Management was spun out of Microsoft Corp. co-founder Paul Allen’s family office in late 2021, its US stocks portfolio had a 17% weighting to the US software giant.】

item.title: 前往俄罗斯的油轮遭神秘爆炸袭击
item.description: 今年到目前为止，至少有四艘油轮发生爆炸；所有这些油轮在爆炸发生前几周都曾到过俄罗斯领海。【原文：At least four oil tankers have been hit with explosions so far this year — all of them having visited Russia’s territorial waters in the weeks prior to the blasts happening.】
